thread.section_title: Bolt Depot Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bolt Depot | www.boltdepot.com
thread.title: ironspoke

author: ironspoke
title: ironspoke
text: It is always a plus when items arrive quickly like the two orders that I have placed with Bolt Depot. The main thing that I am liking about them is the way the website works to help Me find what I know is needed, and I have had great success exploring hardware options for some more elaborate projects that would definitely not have turned out near as well by digging through local bins. The website has an educational quality to it that reminded Me of things I had forgotten, and teaching an old dog some new tricks as well! I really like that a great American business is continued and has a very interesting history as well!
